text: The Dead Zone is a 1983 American science fiction thriller movie directed by David Cronenberg and was based on the 1979 novel of the same name by Stephen King. It stars Christopher Walken, Tom Skerritt, Brooke Adams, Herbert Lom, Anthony Zerbe, Colleen Dewhurst, Martin Sheen and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1983 thriller movies Category:1983 science fiction movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by David Cronenberg Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Maine Category:Movies based on books by Stephen King Category:Movies about psychic powers Category:Movies about assassinations Category:Movies about educators Category:Movies about telepathy
title: The Dead Zone (movie)
